titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act to permit persons adversely affected by an emergency suspension order to request an expedited hearing on the order.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Department Operations, Research, and Foreign Agriculture.

committee.subcommittee: Department Operations, Research, and Foreign Agriculture
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 3/24/1987--Introduced. Amends the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act to permit persons adversely affected by an emergency pesticide suspension order to request an expedited hearing on such order.
